sense.def:
One's health
je zdravstveno stanje nekoga.

seg.quote: Cigarette smoking is dangerous to your health.
My mother was in poor health.

sense.def:
Health
je stanje, ko smo gibčni in se dobro počutimo.

seg.quote: ...a soldier who was nursed back to health.

sense.def:
To drink to someone's health
ali
to drink someone's health
pomeni piti v znamenje, da nekomu želimo zdravje in srečo.

The health of an organization or system
je uspeh, ki ga ima neka organizacija ali sistem in dejstvo, da dobro deluje.

seg.quote: ...the health of the British film industry.
